titleStmt.title: SII 8.74: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 74. (A.R. No. 485 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME PRAKARA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tiripuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīrājarāja tevarkku yāṇṭu 10 6vatu Iṣapanāyaṟṟu Irupatteṭṭān tiyatiyum caṉikkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa mirukaciriṣattu nāḷ Uṭaiyār tiruvaṇṇāmalaiyuṭaiya
nāyaṉār koyil cimāheśvara k kaṅkāṇi ceyvaārkaḷum tevarkanmi koyiṟ kaṇakkaṉum tiruveṇṇainallūruṭaiyān meykaṇṭatevan Ūruṭaiyapperumāḷāṉa Eṭuttatuvaliyaveḷaārkku kal veṭṭikkuṭuttaparicā
vatu . Innāyanār tevartāṉañ ceṅkunṟanāṭṭu māttūrāṉa Irācarācanallūril Ivar veṭṭivitta meykaṇṭatevap putterikku kaṭamai yiṟukkumiṭattu tiruttiṉa Āṇṭu kuḻi nāḻiyum pāṭikāvalluṅ koḷḷakkaṭavatākavum Itan E
tirāmāṇṭu kālvaricaiyum pāṭikāvalum Iṟukkakkaṭavatākavum Itan Etirāmāṇṭumutal kāle Araikkāl varicaiyum pāṭikāvalum Uṭpaṭa veli Eṇpatin kalam Iṟukkakkaṭavatākavum Ivventalukku Ellai Aracukku kiḻakku nireṟiṉa
nilam tirittip payiṟceyyakkaṭavatākāvum Ivventalukku puñcainilam Araicukku kiḻakku tirukkovalūṟ peruvaḻikku vaṭakku Ivventalaic cūḻnta nilattile Añcuveli taṟai Ellaiyāy paṇṭārattukku kaṭamai Iṟukka kaṭavatākavum Ivventalil
tiruttuppaṭṭa nilattile Ivvirācarācanallūril Eḻuntaruḷivikkiṟa Uṭaiyār meykaṇṭicuramuṭaiyanāyanārkku pūcaikkum Amutupaṭikkum muṉṟil Onṟu tevatāṉamāvutākavum Ivverikku Erippaṭṭi maṉṟāṭṭuppaṭṭiyumāka Aiññūṟu kuḻi viṭakkaṭavatākavum Ivvental
tam poruḷiṭṭu veṭṭukiṟanilam Ivveriyum nilamuṅ kuṭiniṅkā tevatāṉamāy Ivarkku cantirātittavaraiyum kāṇiyāy viṟṟoṟṟip parikkirakañ cellakkaṭavatākavum . Ippaṭi cammatittuk kal veṭṭikkuṭuttom Ivvaṉaivom . Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 8.74 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
